question.title: Android Java project - Layout not displaying correctly (Button under listview)

node.contents: UPDATE: Thanks everyone for your help, layout_weight is what I was after.

astNode.text: UPDATE: Thanks everyone for your help, layout_weight is what I was after.

node.contents: I am currently working on my first android project in java. I am trying to use a linearlayout which has a listview spanning most of the page but has a load more button at the bottom of the app.

astNode.text: I am currently working on my first android project in java. I am trying to use a linearlayout which has a listview spanning most of the page but has a load more button at the bottom of the app.

node.contents: This is what it SHOULD look like and is what is previewed to me in Eclipse

astNode.text: This is what it SHOULD look like and is what is previewed to me in Eclipse

node.contents: and this is what is happening when I actually run the application

astNode.text: and this is what is happening when I actually run the application

node.contents: The button for some reason is moved a lot higher then I would like, I would like it to stick to the bottom of the page and have the listview take up the rest of the screen...

astNode.text: The button for some reason is moved a lot higher then I would like, I would like it to stick to the bottom of the page and have the listview take up the rest of the screen...

elements.contents: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent" android:background="#000000"> <ListView android:id="@+id/listview" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="434dp" android:maxHeight="434dp" android:minHeight="434dp" android:background="#000000" > </ListView> <Button android:id="@+id/button1" style="?android:attr/buttonStyleSmall" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="27dp" android:maxHeight="27dp" android:text="Load More..." android:textSize="@dimen/dp12" /> </LinearLayout>

node.contents: What have I done wrong or not done at all which is required to keep the button at the bottom of the page?

astNode.text: What have I done wrong or not done at all which is required to keep the button at the bottom of the page?

node.contents: It looks like you are setting up the layout using dp measurements. Try using the weight attribute instead. It should do what you want and scale nicely.

astNode.text: It looks like you are setting up the layout using dp measurements. Try using the weight attribute instead. It should do what you want and scale nicely.

elements.contents: <ListView android:id="@+id/listview" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="0dip" android:layout_weight="1.00" android:background="#000000" > </ListView> <Button android:id="@+id/button1" style="?android:attr/buttonStyleSmall" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="27dp" android:maxHeight="27dp" android:text="Load More..." android:textSize="@dimen/dp12" />
